titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: DIVISION OF THE QUESTION - Mr. Fazio asked that the question on agreeing to the resolution be divided in order to have a separate vote on that portion of the resolution relating to the election of the Chaplain. The question was divided and the Speaker put the question on that portion of the resolution electing the Chaplain.
On agreeing to the first portion of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Robin H. Carle as Clerk; (2) Wilson S. Livingood as Sergeant at Arms; and (3) Reverend James David Ford as Chaplain.
